mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clubBoard(boardNum, subject, content, saveFileName, originalFileName, memberNum, clubNum, categoryNum) VALUES(clubBoard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberNum}, #{clubNum}, #{categoryNum})
mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, subject, content, created, saveFileName, originalFileName, memberNum, categoryNum FROM clubBoard WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE clubBoard SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clubBoardReply(replyNum, replyContent, boardNum, memberNum) VALUES(clubBoardReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{boardNum}, #{memberNum})
INSERT INTO clubBoardReply(replyNum, replyContent, boardNum, memberNum, answer) VALUES(clubBoardReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{boardNum}, #{memberNum}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM clubBoardReply WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum} AND NVL(answer, 0)=0
